title: Venus: Beauty and Beast
description: For thousands of years, Venus has been a fascinating planet to humans. Students will love learning more about this bright spot in our sky in Venus: Beauty and Beast. This book explains all about the closest planet to Earth and includes detailed photographs, charts, and easy-to-understand text. Students will also have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
